description:
As a user
    I would like to be able to update my shopping cart
    so that I am able to proceed with checkout
name: Shopping Cart Workflow

steps.name: I am in react app landing page
I should be able to see the different products listed
I add a product to cart
I should be able to see it in shopping cart
I am in react app landing page
I should be able to see the different products listed
I increase a product quantity in cart

steps.name: I should be able to see the amount updated
I am in react app landing page
I should be able to see the different products listed
I remove a product from cart
I should not be able to see it in shopping cart
